meanings.definition: The act of stitching together layers of fabric to create a padded material.
meanings.sent1: My grandma enjoys quilting in her cozy room.
meanings.sent2: She learned quilting from her mother and now makes beautiful quilts.
meanings.sent3: The quilting group had a competition to see who could sew the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her quilting skills were as precise as a surgeon's stitches.
meanings.sent5: The art of quilting requires patience and attention to detail.

meanings.definition: A decorative design or pattern created by stitching together layers of fabric.
meanings.sent1: The quilting on the pillow added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The intricate quilting on the dress caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: She admired the quilting on the tablecloth, imagining the effort put into it.
meanings.sent4: The quilting resembled a maze of threads, creating a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent5: The quilting design was so unique that it inspired her to try a new pattern.

meanings.definition: The craft or practice of making quilts.
meanings.sent1: Quilting requires skill and creativity to produce beautiful blankets.
meanings.sent2: She took up quilting as a hobby and found it to be very rewarding.
meanings.sent3: The quilting class was full of laughter and shared stories.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for quilting was evident in every stitch she made.
meanings.sent5: The art of quilting has a long history dating back to ancient times.
